embed.description: This is the voice for the new Champion Ornn in English. replies.body: Ornn and Hammer are officially the best partnership in the history of everything.

> [{quoted}](name=Celeburus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ABQYerv3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-09T02:30:31.259+0000)
>
> Ornn and Hammer are officially the best partnership in the history of everything.

You have no idea.

Off topic, but according to match history you're the GP who told me he recognized me from the boards.  So I stalked you and am posting this comment.  
…
…
Hi !

"I am going in that direction. Do not follow me."

Top laners gonna love this guy.

Okay so Doran's name is pronounced "Doh-ran"
For some reason I assumed "Door-an"
Learned something new.

Also no remark on Galio?
